availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel Breckinridge Rawlins (Estill County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Benjamin H. Rawlins and Sally Rawlins. Married to Rebecca Jane Shepherd Rawlins in Estill County, Kentucky, on November 12, 1853. Father of Sally Rawlins, Andrew Rawlins, Daniel Rawlins, Rebecca Rawlins, and Benjamin Rawlins. Laborer in Estill County in 1850. Farmer in Estill County in 1860. Farmer in Estill County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 99A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 257.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Irvine, p. 548B-549A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Estill County, KY, August 1863, p. 297.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Estill County Marriages, Film #000254628, p. 61.
